dialogheader: The form of dialogue to fill custom data
accordion_msg_about_1step: This is the first step in which you fill in the required fields
accordion_msg_about_2step: This is the second step in which you fill in the required fields
accordion_msg_about_3step: This is the third step in which you fill in the required fields
accordion_msg_about_more: This field will be shown more information about the registration process
accordion_msg_about_main:
This is the main field with details
You can use the keys TAB / Alt-TAB to switch fields and keys ↑ and ↓ to select an accordion.
\ For this we need to make the current window by clicking on its title
you_can_move_resize: You can move this area and change its size
you_are_admin_and_you_all_known: You are an administrator and you know what to do ...
you_are_user_and_do_all: You are user and you must should carefully fill all required fields.
dialinfo0: Click on an item to expand the data
accordion_err_field_empty: Selected field can not be empty
passwords_not_match: Fields with passwords do not match
too_short_field: The field length should not be less than three characters
accordion_field21_value: The information about some abstract field21
accordion_field22_value: The information about some abstract field22
accordion_field23_value: The information about some abstract field23
